1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Arnold,
Thank you for the update. Please let me know when you would like to speak next week.
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Have a great weekend,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: arnoldmyers@hotmail [mailto:arnoldmyers@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 05, 2011 4:44 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Nicolette,
After my conversation today, I realize I will be speaking with another company. I will be speaking with you more next week on moving forward.
Regards,
Arnold.
Sent from my Verizon Wireless Phone
-----Original message----- From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: "arnoldmyers@hotmail" <arnoldmyers@hotmail.com> Sent: Wed, Oct 5, 2011 20:32:40 GMT+00:00 Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Hi Arnold,
Great. I would be happy to have a conversation with him to explain our business model and address his concerns, and if he has a specific document in mind I would be happy to review it.
Please let me know when you are ready to move forward and provide me with Winstons contact information and I will reach out to him.
Have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: arnoldmyers@hotmail [mailto:arnoldmyers@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 05, 2011 10:55 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Nicolette,
I should be speaking with Winston today about my rate. He indicated MBO will need to sign a non-compete form, for him to feel comfortable.
Sent from my Verizon Wireless Phone
-----Original message----- From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: Arnold Myers <arnoldmyers@hotmail.com> Sent: Wed, Oct 5, 2011 14:31:27 GMT+00:00 Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Hi Arnold,
Great! Please let me know if you have any questions and when you have spoken with your company and are ready to move forward with the contract process just let me know.
Have a great day,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: Arnold Myers [mailto:arnoldmyers@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 04, 2011 9:36 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Nicolette,
I completed the online registration and will be getting the I-9 form notarized this week. Thank you for all your help and I look forward to speaking with you soon.
Regards,
Arnold Myers Date: Tue, 4 Oct 2011 20:37:42 -0400 From: ntaylor@mbopartners.com To: arnoldmyers@hotmail.com Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear Arnold, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become a MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. Please begin enrollment by clicking here. Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to working with you. Regards, Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6281 Toll Free: 800-556-0270 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300 Herndon, VA 20171 http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
